message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection. We understand its worth to you is substantial at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and rarity, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
